meanings.definition: To engage in sexual intercourse for payment.
meanings.sent1: She whored herself to earn money.
meanings.sent2: In some places, people whored to survive.
meanings.sent3: The idea of whoring for cash seemed strange to her.
meanings.sent4: His principles were so low that he whored his beliefs for profit.
meanings.sent5: The concept of whoring for pay was shocking to the young girl.

meanings.definition: To debase oneself by engaging in promiscuous sexual activity.
meanings.sent1: He whored around and lost respect from others.
meanings.sent2: Some individuals feel empty after whoring themselves out.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her friend would never stop whoring around.
meanings.sent4: The politician whored his integrity for power.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of whoring around can be damaging to one's reputation.

meanings.sent1: She whored on the streets to make a living.
meanings.sent2: In the olden days, women whored discreetly to survive.
meanings.sent3: The cat whored itself out for extra treats.
meanings.sent4: The company whored its services to attract more clients.
meanings.sent5: The idea of whoring as a profession was foreign to him.
